pageContext.claim: “The Democrats want to abolish ICE. They want to abolish ICE. They want America to be a giant sanctuary city for gang members and MS-13 killers.”
pageContext.analysis: Some Democrats have been calling to abolish U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, but it’s not a widely held position and some Democrats say the agency should be reformed, not abolished. In any case, ICE is only one of several agencies tasked with immigration enforcement. There is limited research on the impact of sanctuary policies and crime. And the research that does exist challenges Trump’s claim.
